issue.title: [Python] Expose compressors as pyarrow.compress, pyarrow.decompress
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1782](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1782). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These should release the GIL, and serve as an alternative to the various compressor wrapper libraries out there. They should have the ability to work with `pyarrow.Buffer` or `PyBytes` as the user prefers

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1782?focusedCommentId=16264423) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1345
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1345>
